content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The wait is plausible compare to other places. Also the ambiance and the music is loud and it seems like an adult environment when sun goes down.We tried the marinated short rib bbq and spicy bulgogi. The side dishes are limited but the meat is so good that it's not important.Alex was our server and he showed up a good time and made us laugh a lot. Thank you.
